dtrsmKernel.c

00032 
00043 #include "c6x.h"
00044 #include "dtrsmKernel.h"
00045 #include "defDC66.h"
00046 
00047 
00048 void dtrsmKernel(const double *pA, double *pB, double *pC, double *pBHat, const int k, const int stepC,
00049                 const int flagisN, const int flagisL)
00050 {
00051   double sum00, sum01, sum02, sum03;
00052   double sum10, sum11, sum12, sum13;
00053   double sum20, sum21, sum22, sum23;
00054   double sum30, sum31, sum32, sum33;
00055   const double * restrict pRegA;
00056   double * restrict pRegB, * restrict pRegBH, * restrict pRegC;
00057   double a00, a01, a02, a03;
00058   double a10, a11, a12, a13;
00059   double a20, a21, a22, a23;
00060   double a30, a31, a32, a33;
00061   double tempd;
00062   int index;
00063 
00064   sum00 = 0.0;
00065   sum01 = 0.0;
00066   sum02 = 0.0;
00067   sum03 = 0.0;
00068   sum10 = 0.0;
00069   sum11 = 0.0;
00070   sum12 = 0.0;
00071   sum13 = 0.0;
00072   sum20 = 0.0;
00073   sum21 = 0.0;
00074   sum22 = 0.0;
00075   sum23 = 0.0;
00076   sum30 = 0.0;
00077   sum31 = 0.0;
00078   sum32 = 0.0;
00079   sum33 = 0.0;
00080 
00081   pRegA = pA;
00082   pRegB = pB;
00083   for(index = 0; index < k; index++)
00084   {  // loop over k;
00085          // each iteration performs rank one update of 4x1 by 1x4
00086          // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00087      // accumulated over 4x4 matrix
00088      double a0, a1, a2, a3;
00089      double b0, b1, b2, b3;
00090 
00091      a0 = *pRegA++;
00092      a1 = *pRegA++;
00093      a2 = *pRegA++;
00094      a3 = *pRegA++;
00095      b0 = *pRegB++;
00096      b1 = *pRegB++;
00097      b2 = *pRegB++;
00098      b3 = *pRegB++;
00099 
00100      // a[0]*b[0]
00101      sum00 += a0*b0;
00102      // a[0]*b[1]
00103      sum01 += a0*b1;
00104      // a[0]*b[2]
00105      sum02 += a0*b2;
00106      // a[0]*b[3]
00107      sum03 += a0*b3;
00108      // a[1]*b[0]
00109      sum10 += a1*b0;
00110      // a[1]*b[1]
00111      sum11 += a1*b1;
00112      // a[1]*b[2]
00113      sum12 += a1*b2;
00114      // a[1]*b[3]
00115      sum13 += a1*b3;
00116      // a[2]*b[0]
00117      sum20 += a2*b0;
00118      // a[2]*b[1]
00119      sum21 += a2*b1;
00120      // a[2]*b[2]
00121      sum22 += a2*b2;
00122      // a[2]*b[3]
00123      sum23 += a2*b3;
00124      // a[3]*b[0]
00125      sum30 += a3*b0;
00126      // a[3]*b[1]
00127      sum31 += a3*b1;
00128      // a[3]*b[2]
00129      sum32 += a3*b2;
00130      // a[3]*b[3]
00131      sum33 += a3*b3;
00132   }
00133 
00134   if(flagisN > 0)  // final saving in Normal form
00135   {
00136         if(flagisL) // lower triangular
00137         {
00138                   // read and update 4x4 matrix
00139                   pRegC = pC;
00140                   // c[0,0]
00141                   sum00 = (*pRegC++) -sum00;
00142                   // c[1,0]
00143                   sum10 = (*pRegC++) -sum10;
00144                   // c[2,0]
00145                   sum20 = (*pRegC++) -sum20;
00146                   // c[3,0]
00147                   sum30 = (*pRegC++) -sum30;
00148                   // next column
00149                   pRegC += (stepC-4);
00150                   // c[0,1]
00151                   sum01 = (*pRegC++) -sum01;
00152                   // c[1,1]
00153                   sum11 = (*pRegC++) -sum11;
00154                   // c[2,1]
00155                   sum21 = (*pRegC++) -sum21;
00156                   // c[3,1]
00157                   sum31 = (*pRegC++) -sum31;
00158                   // next column
00159                   pRegC += (stepC-4);
00160                   // c[0,2]
00161                   sum02 = (*pRegC++) -sum02;
00162                   // c[1,2]
00163                   sum12 = (*pRegC++) -sum12;
00164                   // c[2,2]
00165                   sum22 = (*pRegC++) -sum22;
00166                   // c[3,2]
00167                   sum32 = (*pRegC++) -sum32;
00168                   // next column
00169                   pRegC += (stepC-4);
00170                   // c[0,3]2
00171                   sum03 = (*pRegC++) -sum03;
00172                   // c[1,3]
00173                   sum13 = (*pRegC++) -sum13;
00174                   // c[2,3]
00175                   sum23 = (*pRegC++) -sum23;
00176                   // c[3,3]
00177                   sum33 = (*pRegC++) -sum33;
00178 
00179                   pRegA = pA+k*M_KERNEL_D;
00180                   // load the 4x4 lower triangular inverse matrix
00181                   a00 = pRegA[0];
00182                   a10 = pRegA[1];
00183                   a20 = pRegA[2];
00184                   a30 = pRegA[3];
00185 
00186                   a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+1];
00187                   a21 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+2];
00188                   a31 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+3];
00189 
00190                   a22 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+2];
00191                   a32 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+3];
00192 
00193                   a33 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+3];
00194 
00195                   // 4x4 matrix multiply followed by saving
00196                   pRegB = pB+k*N_KERNEL_D;
00197                   pRegBH = (pBHat+k);
00198                   pRegC = pC;
00199 
00200                   // update c[0,0]
00201                   tempd = a00*sum00;
00202                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00203                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00204                   *pRegB = tempd;
00205                   // update c[1,0]
00206                   tempd = a10*sum00+a11*sum10;
00207                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00208                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00209                   *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00210                   // update c[2,0]
00211                   tempd = a20*sum00+a21*sum10+a22*sum20;
00212                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00213                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00214                   *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00215                   // update c[3,0]
00216                   tempd = a30*sum00+a31*sum10+a32*sum20+a33*sum30;
00217                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00218                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00219                   *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00220 
00221                   // next column
00222               pRegC += (stepC-4);
00223               pRegBH += (KPARTITION_D-4);
00224               pRegB++;
00225                   // update c[0,1]
00226                   tempd = a00*sum01;
00227                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00228                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00229                   *pRegB = tempd;
00230                   // update c[1,1]
00231                   tempd = a10*sum01+a11*sum11;
00232                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00233                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00234                   *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00235                   // update c[2,1]
00236                   tempd = a20*sum01+a21*sum11+a22*sum21;
00237                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00238                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00239                   *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00240                   // update c[3,1]
00241                   tempd = a30*sum01+a31*sum11+a32*sum21+a33*sum31;
00242                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00243                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00244                   *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00245 
00246                   // next column
00247               pRegC += (stepC-4);
00248               pRegBH += (KPARTITION_D-4);
00249               pRegB++;
00250                   // update c[0,2]
00251                   tempd = a00*sum02;
00252                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00253                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00254                   *pRegB = tempd;
00255                   // update c[1,2]
00256                   tempd = a10*sum02+a11*sum12;
00257                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00258                   *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00259                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00260                   // update c[2,2]
00261                   tempd = a20*sum02+a21*sum12+a22*sum22;
00262                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00263                   *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00264                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00265                   // update c[3,2]
00266                   tempd = a30*sum02+a31*sum12+a32*sum22+a33*sum32;
00267                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00268                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00269                   *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00270 
00271                   // next column
00272               pRegC += (stepC-4);
00273               pRegBH += (KPARTITION_D-4);
00274               pRegB++;
00275                   // update c[0,3]
00276                   tempd = a00*sum03;
00277                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00278                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00279                   *pRegB = tempd;
00280                   // update c[1,3]
00281                   tempd = a10*sum03+a11*sum13;
00282                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00283                   *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00284                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00285                   // update c[2,3]
00286                   tempd = a20*sum03+a21*sum13+a22*sum23;
00287                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00288                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00289                   *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00290                   // update c[3,3]
00291                   tempd = a30*sum03+a31*sum13+a32*sum23+a33*sum33;
00292                   *pRegC++ = tempd;
00293                   *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00294                   *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00295 
00296         }
00297         else // upper triangular
00298         {
00299 
00300           // read and update 4x4 matrix
00301           pRegC = pC;
00302           // c[0,0]
00303           sum00 = (*pRegC++) -sum00;
00304           // c[1,0]
00305           sum10 = (*pRegC++) -sum10;
00306           // c[2,0]
00307           sum20 = (*pRegC++) -sum20;
00308           // c[3,0]
00309           sum30 = (*pRegC++) -sum30;
00310           // next column
00311           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00312           // c[0,1]
00313           sum01 = (*pRegC++) -sum01;
00314           // c[1,1]
00315           sum11 = (*pRegC++) -sum11;
00316           // c[2,1]
00317           sum21 = (*pRegC++) -sum21;
00318           // c[3,1]
00319           sum31 = (*pRegC++) -sum31;
00320           // next column
00321           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00322           // c[0,2]
00323           sum02 = (*pRegC++) -sum02;
00324           // c[1,2]
00325           sum12 = (*pRegC++) -sum12;
00326           // c[2,2]
00327           sum22 = (*pRegC++) -sum22;
00328           // c[3,2]
00329           sum32 = (*pRegC++) -sum32;
00330           // next column
00331           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00332           // c[0,3]2
00333           sum03 = (*pRegC++) -sum03;
00334           // c[1,3]
00335           sum13 = (*pRegC++) -sum13;
00336           // c[2,3]
00337           sum23 = (*pRegC++) -sum23;
00338           // c[3,3]
00339           sum33 = (*pRegC++) -sum33;
00340 
00341           pRegA = pA-M_KERNEL_D*M_KERNEL_D;
00342           // load the 4x4 upper triangular inverse matrix
00343           a00 = pRegA[0];
00344 
00345           a01 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D];
00346           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+1];
00347 
00348           a02 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D];
00349           a12 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+1];
00350           a22 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+2];
00351 
00352           a03 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D];
00353           a13 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+1];
00354           a23 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+2];
00355           a33 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+3];
00356 
00357           // 4x4 matrix multiply followed by saving
00358           pRegB = pB-M_KERNEL_D*M_KERNEL_D;
00359           pRegBH = (double *) (pBHat-M_KERNEL_D);
00360           pRegC = pC;
00361 
00362           tempd = a00*sum00+a01*sum10+a02*sum20+a03*sum30;
00363           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00364           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00365           *pRegB = tempd;
00366           // update c[1,0]
00367           tempd = a11*sum10+a12*sum20+a13*sum30;
00368           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00369           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00370           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00371           // update c[2,0]
00372           tempd = a22*sum20+a23*sum30;
00373           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00374           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00375           *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00376           // update c[3,0]
00377           tempd = a33*sum30;
00378           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00379           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00380           *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00381 
00382           // next column
00383           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00384       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_D-4);
00385           pRegB++;
00386           // update c[0,1]
00387           tempd = a00*sum01+a01*sum11+a02*sum21+a03*sum31;
00388           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00389           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00390           *pRegB = tempd;
00391           // update c[1,1]
00392           tempd = a11*sum11+a12*sum21+a13*sum31;
00393           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00394           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00395           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00396           // update c[2,1]
00397           tempd = a22*sum21+a23*sum31;
00398           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00399           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00400           *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00401           // update c[3,1]
00402           tempd = a33*sum31;
00403           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00404           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00405           *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00406 
00407           // next column
00408       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00409       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_D-4);
00410       pRegB++;
00411           // update c[0,2]
00412           tempd = a00*sum02+a01*sum12+a02*sum22+a03*sum32;
00413           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00414           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00415           *pRegB = tempd;
00416           // update c[1,2]
00417           tempd = a11*sum12+a12*sum22+a13*sum32;
00418           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00419           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00420           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00421           // update c[2,2]
00422           tempd = a22*sum22+a23*sum32;
00423           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00424           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00425           *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00426           // update c[3,2]
00427           tempd = a33*sum32;
00428           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00429           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00430           *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00431 
00432           // next column
00433       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00434       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_D-4);
00435       pRegB++;
00436           // update c[0,3]
00437           tempd = a00*sum03+a01*sum13+a02*sum23+a03*sum33;
00438           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00439           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00440           *pRegB = tempd;
00441           // update c[1,3]
00442           tempd = a11*sum13+a12*sum23+a13*sum33;
00443           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00444           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00445           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00446           // update c[2,3]
00447           tempd = a22*sum23+a23*sum33;
00448           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00449           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00450           *(pRegB+2*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00451           // update c[3,3]
00452           tempd = a33*sum33;
00453           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00454           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00455           *(pRegB+3*N_KERNEL_D) = tempd;
00456         }
00457   }
00458   else   // final saving in transpose form
00459   {
00460         if(flagisL) // lower triangular
00461         {
00462           // read and update 4x4 matrix
00463           pRegC = pC;
00464           // c[0,0]
00465           sum00 = (*pRegC++) -sum00;
00466           // c[0,1]
00467           sum01 = (*pRegC++) -sum01;
00468           // c[0,2]
00469           sum02 = (*pRegC++) -sum02;
00470           // c[0,3]
00471           sum03 = (*pRegC++) -sum03;
00472           // next column
00473           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00474           // c[1,0]
00475           sum10 = (*pRegC++) -sum10;
00476           // c[1,1]
00477           sum11 = (*pRegC++) -sum11;
00478           // c[1,2]
00479           sum12 = (*pRegC++) -sum12;
00480           // c[1,3]
00481           sum13 = (*pRegC++) -sum13;
00482           // next column
00483           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00484           // c[2,0]
00485           sum20 = (*pRegC++) -sum20;
00486           // c[2,1]
00487           sum21 = (*pRegC++) -sum21;
00488           // c[2,2]
00489           sum22 = (*pRegC++) -sum22;
00490           // c[2,3]
00491           sum23 = (*pRegC++) -sum23;
00492           // next column
00493           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00494           // c[3,0]2
00495           sum30 = (*pRegC++) -sum30;
00496           // c[3,1]
00497           sum31 = (*pRegC++) -sum31;
00498           // c[3,2]
00499           sum32 = (*pRegC++) -sum32;
00500           // c[3,3]
00501           sum33 = (*pRegC++) -sum33;
00502 
00503           pRegA = pA+k*M_KERNEL_D;
00504           // load the 4x4 lower triangular inverse matrix
00505           a00 = pRegA[0];
00506           a10 = pRegA[1];
00507           a20 = pRegA[2];
00508           a30 = pRegA[3];
00509 
00510           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+1];
00511           a21 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+2];
00512           a31 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+3];
00513 
00514           a22 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+2];
00515           a32 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+3];
00516 
00517           a33 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+3];
00518 
00519           // 4x4 matrix multiply followed by saving
00520           pRegB = pB+k*N_KERNEL_D;
00521           pRegBH = (pBHat+k*NPARTITION_D);
00522           pRegC = pC;
00523 
00524           // update c[0,0]
00525           tempd = a00*sum00;
00526           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00527           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00528           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00529           // update c[0,1]
00530           tempd = a00*sum01;
00531           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00532           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00533           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00534           // update c[0,2]
00535           tempd = a00*sum02;
00536           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00537           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00538           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00539           // update c[0,3]
00540           tempd = a00*sum03;
00541           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00542           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00543           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00544 
00545           // next column
00546       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00547       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_D-4);
00548           // update c[1,0]
00549           tempd = a10*sum00+a11*sum10;
00550           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00551           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00552           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00553           // update c[1,1]
00554           tempd = a10*sum01+a11*sum11;
00555           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00556           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00557           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00558           // update c[1,2]
00559           tempd = a10*sum02+a11*sum12;
00560           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00561           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00562           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00563           // update c[1,3]
00564           tempd = a10*sum03+a11*sum13;
00565           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00566           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00567           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00568 
00569           // next column
00570       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00571       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_D-4);
00572           // update c[2,0]
00573           tempd = a20*sum00+a21*sum10+a22*sum20;
00574           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00575           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00576           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00577           // update c[2,1]
00578           tempd = a20*sum01+a21*sum11+a22*sum21;
00579           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00580           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00581           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00582           // update c[2,2]
00583           tempd = a20*sum02+a21*sum12+a22*sum22;
00584           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00585           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00586           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00587           // update c[2,3]
00588           tempd = a20*sum03+a21*sum13+a22*sum23;
00589           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00590           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00591           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00592 
00593           // next column
00594       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00595       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_D-4);
00596           // update c[3,0]
00597           tempd = a30*sum00+a31*sum10+a32*sum20+a33*sum30;
00598           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00599           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00600           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00601           // update c[3,1]
00602           tempd = a30*sum01+a31*sum11+a32*sum21+a33*sum31;
00603           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00604           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00605           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00606           // update c[3,2]
00607           tempd = a30*sum02+a31*sum12+a32*sum22+a33*sum32;
00608           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00609           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00610           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00611           // update c[3,3]
00612           tempd = a30*sum03+a31*sum13+a32*sum23+a33*sum33;
00613           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00614           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00615           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00616         }
00617         else // upper triangular
00618         {
00619           // read and update 4x4 matrix
00620           pRegC = pC;
00621           // c[0,0]
00622           sum00 = (*pRegC++) -sum00;
00623           // c[0,1]
00624           sum01 = (*pRegC++) -sum01;
00625           // c[0,2]
00626           sum02 = (*pRegC++) -sum02;
00627           // c[0,3]
00628           sum03 = (*pRegC++) -sum03;
00629 
00630           // next column
00631           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00632           // c[1,0]
00633           sum10 = (*pRegC++) -sum10;
00634           // c[1,1]
00635           sum11 = (*pRegC++) -sum11;
00636           // c[1,2]
00637           sum12 = (*pRegC++) -sum12;
00638           // c[1,3]
00639           sum13 = (*pRegC++) -sum13;
00640 
00641           // next column
00642           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00643           // c[2,0]
00644           sum20 = (*pRegC++) -sum20;
00645           // c[2,1]
00646           sum21 = (*pRegC++) -sum21;
00647           // c[2,2]
00648           sum22 = (*pRegC++) -sum22;
00649           // c[2,3]
00650           sum23 = (*pRegC++) -sum23;
00651 
00652           // next column
00653           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00654           // c[3,0]
00655           sum30 = (*pRegC++) -sum30;
00656           // c[3,1]
00657           sum31 = (*pRegC++) -sum31;
00658           // c[3,2]
00659           sum32 = (*pRegC++) -sum32;
00660           // c[3,3]
00661           sum33 = (*pRegC++) -sum33;
00662 
00663           pRegA = pA-M_KERNEL_D*M_KERNEL_D;
00664           // load the 4x4 upper triangular inverse matrix
00665           a00 = pRegA[0];
00666 
00667           a01 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D];
00668           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_D+1];
00669 
00670           a02 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D];
00671           a12 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+1];
00672           a22 = pRegA[2*M_KERNEL_D+2];
00673 
00674           a03 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D];
00675           a13 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+1];
00676           a23 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+2];
00677           a33 = pRegA[3*M_KERNEL_D+3];
00678 
00679           // 4x4 matrix multiply followed by saving
00680           pRegB = pB-M_KERNEL_D*M_KERNEL_D;
00681           pRegBH = (pBHat-M_KERNEL_D*NPARTITION_D);
00682           pRegC = pC;
00683 
00684           // update c[0,0]
00685           tempd = a00*sum00+a01*sum10+a02*sum20+a03*sum30;
00686           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00687           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00688           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00689           // update c[0,1]
00690           tempd = a00*sum01+a01*sum11+a02*sum21+a03*sum31;
00691           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00692           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00693           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00694           // update c[0,2]
00695           tempd = a00*sum02+a01*sum12+a02*sum22+a03*sum32;
00696           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00697           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00698           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00699           // update c[0,3]
00700           tempd = a00*sum03+a01*sum13+a02*sum23+a03*sum33;
00701           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00702           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00703           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00704 
00705           // next column
00706           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00707       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_D-4);
00708           // update c[1,0]
00709           tempd = a11*sum10+a12*sum20+a13*sum30;
00710           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00711           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00712           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00713           // update c[1,1]
00714           tempd = a11*sum11+a12*sum21+a13*sum31;
00715           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00716           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00717           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00718           // update c[1,2]
00719           tempd = a11*sum12+a12*sum22+a13*sum32;
00720           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00721           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00722           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00723           // update c[1,3]
00724           tempd = a11*sum13+a12*sum23+a13*sum33;
00725           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00726           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00727           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00728 
00729           // next column
00730       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00731       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_D-4);
00732       // update c[2,0]
00733           tempd = a22*sum20+a23*sum30;
00734           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00735           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00736           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00737           // update c[2,1]
00738           tempd = a22*sum21+a23*sum31;
00739           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00740           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00741           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00742           // update c[2,2]
00743           tempd = a22*sum22+a23*sum32;
00744           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00745           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00746           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00747           // update c[2,3]
00748           tempd = a22*sum23+a23*sum33;
00749           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00750           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00751           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00752 
00753           // next column
00754       pRegC += (stepC-4);
00755       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_D-4);
00756           // update c[3,0]
00757           tempd = a33*sum30;
00758           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00759           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00760           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00761           // update c[3,1]
00762           tempd = a33*sum31;
00763           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00764           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00765           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00766           // update c[3,2]
00767           tempd = a33*sum32;
00768           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00769           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00770           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00771           // update c[3,3]
00772           tempd = a33*sum33;
00773           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00774           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00775           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00776         }
00777   }
00778 
00779   return;
00780 } // dtrsmKernel()
